DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective study aim assess economic impact early initiation 5-alpha-reductase inhibitor ( 5ARI ) therapy patient enlarge prostate ( EP ) receive 5ARI alpha-blocker ( AB ) combination therapy . Both Integrated Health Care Information Solutions PharMetrics databases utilized study ( 2000-2007 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Dutasteride Enlarged Prostate Economic Assessment : A Retrospective Database Pooled Analysis Early 5-alpha Reductase Inhibitor Use
